long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small chrome extension to help sort the Pull Requests in Github by merge time.

How it works:
1. Open the Pull Request tab of your repository page on Github, change the filters to filter merged PRs (is:merged)
2. You should see a green “Sort by Merged” button in Github toolbar.
4. Enter # of additional pages to load (optional)
5. Click the Sort by Merged button
4. All the PRs should be sorted by the merged datetime
